item.title: Debugging a series of miscalculations in osquery
item.description: Heads up, we’ve moved! If you’d like to continue keeping up with the latest technical content from Square please visit us at our new home https://developer.squareup.com/blog What is osquery ? osquery is an an open source tool by Facebook that provides a SQL interface for system information. Over the course of the summer I’ve been working on integrating osquery results into our internal asset tracker for automation/validation purposes. It’s been incredibly useful for monitoring various stats, and the SQL interface makes it easy to use.
